title: I was recently Ddosed in my last game! Riot Please investigate! i dont want to be demoted anymore...

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Dear all,

Check this out for your safety aswell because if you see any of those players you might get Ddossed in the future, not me obviously im the Blikzim - Darius player, and since it happened to me i dont think i would ddos myself to get demoted.

I recently played a game and was ddosed near the end, i was carrying so well and got their base open 1 tower off nexus, our team was fighting and lost mid tower and then i was disconnected with the loading bar in game, and i was watching then fight and i couldnt move i had 0 cooldown on my deahtimer i didnt even spawn on my screen.. please investigate those players i couldnt even join the game after closing it.

Thanks Riot and The Tool Fixing Team

replies.body:
Yeah that's a definite hack, check out the gold totals;
4 kills, 1 primary and 4 assists per kill = 300+100+100+100+100 = 700 gold per kill x4 = 4.2k gold
Baron is 300x5 so 1500g there, total 5.7k gold their team should've earnt, since nobody was on a streak of deaths OR kills. Everyone was worth 300g
Your team ALSO gets dragon & a turret, you WERE at a 5.8k gold lead and then you somehow drop to 278 gold BEHIND before the game ends. 
For no reason. There's a missing 1k+ gold there easily.
